Name: PENDING
Description: The calculation has been submitted but has not yet begun.

Name: STARTED
Description: The calculation has begun. This flag is never deleted, so it is useful for confirming that the calculation at least started, even if it did not finish.

Name: CONVERGED
Description: The optimisation converged successfully (only used for optimisations).

Name: NOT_CONVERGED
Description: The optimisation did not converge successfully (only used for optimisations).

Name: CLEANUP
Description: The calculation has finished (successfully or otherwise) and Silico is currently performing clean up.

Name: ERROR
Description: The calculation has stopped because an error occurred.

Name: POST
Description: The calculation has finished and Silico is currently performing post analysis.

Name: DONE
Description: All work (including post-analysis) has been completed; Silico will not make any changes after this flag. It is safe to move, download or delete the calculation folder.
